title: Will Death Sworn Skins go on Sale?
body: Hello, I've been wondering, will the new skins go on sale? I want to get them now but if there will be a sale later on id rather wait. Thanks :)

replies.body: We always make sure to announce any sales at least 2 weeks in advance on the [**Sales Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) ^_^!
